iti32:2.1: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
iti32:2.3: Pāpakena ca sīlena, pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā.
iti32:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye”ti.
iti32:4.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
